column5: Hi Everyone,  I will not be able to make the ice fishing Tyler G2G due to conflicting arrangements. I would like to extend my best wishes to everyone that is attending the tourney. I know that there has been an extremely tremendous amount of work gone into the organization of the event and I am confident that it will again be a great success.  I am also anxious to see who will de-throne Terry this year with the biggest fish.  Best of luck to all and I will be waiting for the results.  Kind regards, Sam and Laurie

what you don't want me to win again.......lol  and here I had my heart set on wearing the crown again we do have a crown don't we............ good luck to all, it will be another fun day   Terry  A little something to shoot for
Sorry to hear you can't make it this year Sam! I was looking forward to seeing you again!  take care and I'll be talking to you soon!

That's too bad Sam.  Is there still safe ice at Quinte?  I just had a thought, zip out to Belleville after the Tyler G2G and get a motel room then get out fishing on Sunday.  Do you still have live minnows?  Tony
